snippet.title: Spammerina! Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Spammerina is a Pseudo-Idle Adventure RPG coming to Steam in August!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3077930/Spammerina/
Wishlist on Steam now!

Ever wanted to just Spam a bunch of Spells? Discover and Enhance your new favourite spells to slay a myriad of monsters! Loot, Explore, and Uncover the Secrets of The Dark Continent! Blast beasts with Blood magic, Divine Judgement, and more! The Dark Continent is waiting... 

Thank you Chaofanatic for the visual effects. Check them out at:
https://www.youtube.com/@Chaofanatic

Stunning Music by YouFulca:
https://wingless-seraph.net/en/material-riyoukiyaku_eng.html

#indiegame #idle #gaming #pixelart #retro #rpg
